front.title: RTP Control Protocol (RTCP) Extended Report (XR) Block for MPEG Transport Stream (TS) Program Specific Information (PSI) Independent Decodability Statistics Metric reporting

abstract.t: An MPEG Transport Stream (TS) is a standard container format used in the transmission and storage of multimedia data. Unicast/Multicast/ Broadcast MPEG-TS over RTP is widely deployed in IPTV systems. This document defines an RTP Control Protocol (RTCP) Extended Report (XR) Block that allows the reporting of MPEG TS Program Specific Information (PSI) Independent decodability statistics metrics related to transmissions of MPEG-TS over RTP.
